Issue.creator: nyet
Issue.summary: logger Debugf for "buildChannelHeader" prints garbage epoch
Issue.description: DEBU buildChannelHeader - headerType: CONFIG_UPDATE channelID: blockdaemon txID: %!d(fab.TransactionID=e95ff21d6c8c268948357055de471976f840f6533edbbfad641955c6a8996791) epoch: ^@haincodeID: timestamp: 0001-01-01 00:00:00 +0000 UTC {code} Notice the bad format for "{{epoch: %}}": {code} logger.Debugf("buildChannelHeader - headerType: %s channelID: %s txID: %d epoch: % chaincodeID: %s timestamp: %v", headerType, opts.TxnHeader.channelID, opts.TxnHeader.id, opts.Epoch, opts.ChaincodeID, opts.Timestamp) {code} >
